activities: ProtectWise provides a Cloud Network DVR platform to corporate customers for purposes of detecting and responding to enterprise security events. Through its platform, ProtectWise may access or obtain personal data about a corporate customer's consumers or employees located in the EEA or Switzerland. Acting as a service provider and in accordance with its customers' instructions, ProtectWise accesses or obtains EEA and/or Swiss personal data on behalf of its customers in the course of delivering its cloud security and analytics services. ProtectWise may obtain personal data directly from individuals when they visit the ProtectWise website and provide personal data online. ProtectWise also may obtain personal data directly from individuals in an offline context, for example, in the process of establishing or maintaining customer relationships.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
